医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的 580 万美元拨款旨在改变结核病研究的全球格局由伯明翰阿拉巴马大学 Adrie Steyn 博士和南非德班非洲健康研究所 (AHRI) 牵头的 580 万美元赠款将为用户提供受感染的人体肺组织和分析服务全世界的结核病研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/New-2458-million-grant-aims-to-transform-the-global-landscape-of-TB-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/New-2458-million-grant-aims-to-transform-the-global-landscape-of-TB-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=078a682e-2f2f-4905-bf87-34a2ac9e83ca Fri, 23 Aug 2024 21:10:42 -0400 New $5.8 million grant aims to transform the global landscape of TB research
维克森林再生医学研究所加入美国国家科学基金会资助的新的流行病预测计划维克森林再生医学研究所很荣幸成为一项新计划的一部分，该计划得到了美国国家科学基金会 (NSF) 1800 万美元的资助，旨在增强全球大流行预测和预防能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Wake-Forest-Institute-for-Rogenic-Medicine-joins-new-NSF-funded-pandemic-prediction-initiative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Wake-Forest-Institute-for-Rogenic-Medicine-joins-new-NSF-funded-pandemic-prediction-initiative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de9a183d-b5c6-4a4e-ae7c-46a6947353e4 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 21:02:00 -0400 Wake Forest Institute for Regenerative Medicine joins new NSF-funded pandemic prediction initiative
混合认知行为疗法对儿童焦虑症和强迫症显示出持久的益处哈佛医学院临床心理学家兼心理学助理教授、麦克莱恩焦虑掌握项目联合项目主任杰奎琳·斯珀林博士领导了一项研究，调查强化团体和家庭门诊认知行为治疗结果的可持续性(CBT) 计划，其中包括针对患有焦虑症和/或强迫症 (OCD) 的儿童和青少年的面对面和虚拟治疗课程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Hybrid-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-shows- permanent-benefits-for-pediatric-anxiety-and-OCD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Hybrid-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-shows- permanent-benefits-for-pediatric-anxiety-and-OCD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e620d40a-5b1f-4c12-b532-5c589d2f293e Fri, 23 Aug 2024 20:57:30 -0400 Hybrid cognitive behavioral therapy shows lasting benefits for pediatric anxiety and OCD
中国年轻人中与肥胖相关的癌症发病率惊人增加根据 8 月 22 日发表在 Cell Press 杂志 Med 上的第一份综合研究，2007 年至 2021 年间，中国与肥胖相关的癌症发病率每年以惊人的 3.6% 的速度上升，而与非肥胖相关的癌症则保持稳定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Alarming-increase-in-obesity-lated-cancers-among-young-people-in-China.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Alarming-increase-in-obesity-lated-cancers-among-young-people-in-China.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0c1b6cc-dd36-474d-83fa-2741d48a29d8 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 20:43:20 -0400 Alarming increase in obesity-related cancers among young people in China
整合实验室和现场数据来模拟植物生物钟反应我们对植物昼夜节律的了解大部分是实验室实验的结果，其中光和温度等输入可以严格控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Integrating-laboratory-and-field-data-to-model-plant-circadian-clock-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Integrating-laboratory-and-field-data-to-model-plant-circadian-clock-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bfe7827-f9d9-4936-9568-88eb35c1973d Fri, 23 Aug 2024 20:31:54 -0400 Integrating laboratory and field data to model plant circadian clock responses
研究精制竹醋液在抗痤疮化妆品配方中的功效竹醋液是竹子在高温、厌氧条件下得到的浓缩液体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Investigating-the-benefits-of-refined-bamboo-vinegar-in-anti-acne-cosmetic-formulations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Investigating-the-benefits-of-refined-bamboo-vinegar-in-anti-acne-cosmetic-formulations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a07e04e-10f3-41b3-9467-4842375fbe4b Fri, 23 Aug 2024 20:20:16 -0400 Investigating the benefits of refined bamboo vinegar in anti-acne cosmetic formulations
社会经济因素比城市或乡村生活更能影响儿童与自然的联系孩子所处环境的收入和教育水平决定了他们与自然的关系，而不是他们生活在城市还是乡村。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Socioeconomic-factors-shape-childrens-connection-to-nature-more-than-urban-or-rural-living.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Socioeconomic-factors-shape-childrens-connection-to-nature-more-than-urban-or-rural-living.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=515cdd11-79d3-4880-8e48-e53d885740cb Fri, 23 Aug 2024 20:10:16 -0400 Socioeconomic factors shape children's connection to nature more than urban or rural living
了解有丝分裂期间的核小体行为单个细胞通过称为有丝分裂的过程进行分裂，在此过程中，细胞复制的 DNA 在两个子细胞之间分离。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Understanding-nucleosome-behavior-during-mitosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Understanding-nucleosome-behavior-during-mitosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94a8f1e0-1ab5-42c6-98ac-4d676049182d Fri, 23 Aug 2024 19:54:28 -0400 Understanding nucleosome behavior during mitosis
来自肠道蠕虫的蛋白质可加速皮肤再生并减少疤痕新泽西州罗格斯大学的研究人员发现，肠道寄生虫产生的一种蛋白质可以促进小鼠伤口的愈合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Protein-from-gut-worms-accelerates-skin-regenesis-and-reduces-scarring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Protein-from-gut-worms-accelerates-skin-regenesis-and-reduces-scarring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36bb5b03-b643-4c83-bd10-0210d2b90a75 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 19:48:52 -0400 Protein from gut worms accelerates skin regeneration and reduces scarring
前列腺癌生物标志物检测和个性化医疗的创新在《Cyborg Bionic Systems》最近发表的一篇综合综述中，沉阳北部战区总医院李克一领导的研究人员与国际合作者一起，详细介绍了前列腺癌 (PCa) 生物标志物的识别和应用方面的重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Innovations-in-biomarker-detection-and-personalized-medicine-for-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Innovations-in-biomarker-detection-and-personalized-medicine-for-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a6756b5-4ae0-4a27-bba7-2d077547a429 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 19:41:22 -0400 Innovations in biomarker detection and personalized medicine for prostate cancer
